Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to removing fees associated with bail payments
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Removing fees associated with credit card bail payments and in relation to allowing online bail payment to be made by direct deposit and electronic check.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of correction to notify incarcerated individuals and their legal representatives when an incarcerated individual is held solely due to a bail amount of less than $10
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the dept of correction to notify inmates, defense attorneys, and court personnel when an inmate is detained solely on a bail amount of one dollar.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of correction to notify incarcerated individuals and their legal representatives when an incarcerated individual is held solely due to a bail amount of less than $10
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
Items.MatterName: Requiring the dept of correction to notify inmates, defense attorneys, and court personnel when an inmate is detained solely on a bail amount of one dollar.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of correction to notify incarcerated individuals and their legal representatives when an incarcerated individual is held solely due to a bail amount of less than $10

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of correction to notify incarcerated individuals and their legal representatives when an incarcerated individual is held solely due to a bail amount of less than $10
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
